name: SKTextureFilteringMode
desc: Texture filtering modes to use when the texture is drawn in a size other than its native size.

items.name: case nearest
items.desc: Each pixel is drawn using the nearest point in the texture. This mode is faster, but the results are often pixelated.

items.name: case linear
items.desc: Each pixel is drawn by using a linear filter of multiple texels in the texture. This mode produces higher quality results but may be slower.
